tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicData (
   sequence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sequence_name TEXT,
   sequence_data BYTEA,
   annotation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GenomicSequences (
  sequence_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT current_timestamp
)

CREATE TABLE Annotations (
  annotation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id INTEGER REFERENCES GenomicSequences(sequence_id),
  annotation TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT current_timestamp
)

CREATE TABLE AnnotationsMetadata (
  metadata_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  annotation_id INTEGER REFERENCES Annotations(annotation_id),
  metadata JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT current_timestamp
)

CREATE TABLE annotations (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
sequence_id INT REFERENCES sequences(id),
annotation TEXT NOT NULL,
start_position INT NOT NULL,
end_position INT NOT NULL);
